clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Effect of IV Doses of Rivipansel on Subjects With Renal Impairment and in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Non-randomized, Open-label, Single Dose Study To Evaluate The Effect Of Renal Impairment On The Pharmacokinetics, Safety And Tolerability Of Rivipansel (Pf-06460031) In Subjects With Renal Impairment And In Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of renal impairment on rivipansel.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve from time 0 to infinity or area under the concentration-time curve from time 0 to the time of the last quantifiable concentration, as data permit
primary_outcome.time_frame: Samples are collected pre-dose and at 0.33, 1, 3, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, 36, 48, 72 and 96 H following single dose administration
Samples are collected pre-dose and at 0.33, 1, 3, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, 36, 48, 72 and 96 H following single dose administration
Samples are collected pre-dose and at 0.33, 1, 3, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, 36, 48, 72 and 96 H following single dose administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve from time 0 to the time of the last quantifiable concentration

secondary_outcome.measure: Amount of unchanged drug excreted into urine over 96 hours
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Samples are collected pre-dose and at 0.33, 1, 3, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, 36, 48, 72 and 96 H following single dose administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of dose excreted unchanged into urine over 96 hours
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Samples are collected pre-dose and at 0.33, 1, 3, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, 36, 48, 72 and 96 H following single dose administration
Samples are collected pre-dose and at 0.33, 1, 3, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, 36, 48, 72 and 96 H following single dose administration

arm_group.description: A single dose of IV Rivipansel over 20 minutes
A single dose of IV Rivipansel over 20 minutes
A single dose of IV Rivipansel over 20 minutes

intervention.description: A single 840mg dose of Rivipansel over 20 minutes

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Female subjects of non-childbearing potential or male subjects
- Body Mass Index (BMI) of 17.5 to 40.0 kg/m2
- Stable renal function
Exclusion Criteria:
- A positive urine drug screen for illicit drugs
- Treatment with an investigational drug within 30 days of the dose of study medication
- Pregnant females, breastfeeding female subjects and male subjects with partners currently pregnant
- Use of herbal supplements in the 28 days prior to the dose of study medication
- Blood donation (excluding plasma donation) of approximately 1 pint or more within 56 days prior to study medication
- Requiring dialysis
